short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the title of the current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays the title of the currently active browser tab, allowing users to easily identify and switch between different tabs. It helps in managing multiple open tabs efficiently by showing the specific title of each page, ensuring users always know which content they are viewing.
